title: Why Did I Don't Get A Chest ?
body: So I'm Playing In The Old Client (S6) And At Champion Chest It's Full . So How Can I Get a Free Chest ?

replies.body:
*Timethief49* is on the right track, those are the most basic requirements for earning a hextech chest for your performance in a match. It's also important to note that if you go AFK or leave the match, you'll be ineligible for Hextech loot for that match. You can find a lot more details on how Hextech Crafting works in our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). I strongly recommend you check that guide out.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
